Genotype and Description: This is the negative control, a lab stock of _Escherichia coli_ used for recA1 mutation that makes this strain highly susceptible to radiation. Generously gifted by Dr. Jay Mellies.
This is the positive control, a lab stock that is highly resistant to radiation.
This is the fifth isolate from the primary filter of the Reed Research Reactor (RRR).
This is the second isolate from the primary filter housing of RRR.
This is the first isolate from the surface of the core and pool of RRR.
